Hi! I am Valentin I and I want to build a comprehensive design library that provides both Figma components and cheatsheets for the most common design patterns.


When you start designing it is ideal to have the research and the references at hand, but we rarely have it so we start browsing instead. Lancer wants to compile the preliminary design research right here, in this Figma component library.


Designing this takes time and feedback from fellow designer. So please feel free to offer your suggestions on how to improve the library and bare through this unstable alpha version. Thank you!


Components

  1. Buttons - Default, Primary and Text
  2. Field inputs - Text box, Select box, Datepicker, Textarea
  3. Toggle inputs - Checkbox, Radio Button, Switch
  4. Slider inputs - Single value of range
  5. Menus - Dropdowns, Sidebars
  6. Modal dialogs - Prompt, Onboarding
  7. Lists - Ordered, Unordered
  8. Labels - Light, Dark, Success, Warning, Error
  9. Tooltips
